health.prompt: Which of these identities best captures the healthy person you want to become?

archetypes.title: The Resilient Athlete
archetypes.description: Implying strength, consistency, and pushing limits

archetypes.title: The Energetic Person
archetypes.description: Implying vitality, good sleep, and daily movement

archetypes.title: The Mindful Eater
archetypes.description: Implying a focus on nutrition, presence, and body awareness

career.prompt: Which professional identity are you working towards?

finances.prompt: Which financial identity will bring you peace of mind?

archetypes.title: The Confident Investor
archetypes.description: Implying growth, calculated risks, long-term vision

connections.prompt: Which of these identities will help you build stronger connections?

archetypes.title: The Community Builder
archetypes.description: Implying bringing people together and creating belonging

archetypes.title: The Nurturing Friend
archetypes.description: Implying loyalty, support, and proactive care
